name: Rabbit & Dominoes
description:
Rabbit & Dominoes is a minimalist puzzle game, which you have to help the rabbit collect all the eggs, combining the Dominoes pieces together to get the number showing on the green square. (Those math classes never was so useful until now.)

resources
- 70 puzzles for you to solve
- 70 easter eggs for you to help the bunny catch
- multiple ways to solve the same puzzle

  • - If you fail, the number will be red and the level will reset.


  • - If you get the combination right, the number will be green.


  • - If you get the combination wrong, the pieces will blink red, so you should change theirs positions.
